english.segment1: Hangin' round, found a Bible on the shelf. And I had so much time to sit and read it for myself and there it was. My Bible verified my very thoughts. All Scripture is inspired. I saw Second Timothy, yeah. Verse 3:16, itÂ’s right there. Who says that there's previous errors in my Old Test'ment?. You know it surely isn't me (yeah). Mama, they should read 3:16 (dig it). I saw Second Timothy, yeah. Who's got doubts cause -- it's quite clear. Who says that there's grev-i-ous errors in my Old Test'ment?. Mama, it surely isn't me (yeah).
